scripts.build: browserify src/index.coffee --transform coffeeify --extension='.coffee' -g uglifyify | uglifyjs --screw-ie8 --mangle --compress dead_code,sequences,conditionals,booleans,unused,if_return,join_vars,drop_debugger > public/bundle.js
scripts.watch: nodemon --watch src --watch public/*.html  --watch public/styles/* --watch ../../nodesphere/nodesphere/lib/ --exec 'browserify' src/index.coffee --transform coffeeify --extension='.coffee' --outfile public/bundle.js
